label: 組紐
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 56th  . Nara National Museum . 2004
説明文: These are cords and flat braids made by interlacing bundles of threads in set patterns. A spatula is sometimes used to pack in the thresds, giving rise to alternative name uchihimo. According to the shape of their cross sections the braids divide into flat, round, and square. [↓打紐]
